required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Healthcare Cost and Resource Utilization Related to Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma Treatment With Intravenous and Oral Agents
clinical_study.official_title: A Healthcare Cost and Resource Utilization Analysis of Intravenous and Oral Agents in the Treatment of Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma

brief_summary.textblock: A retrospective study to evaluate healthcare cost and resource utilization for patients with metastatic renal cell carcinoma who have been treated with IV or oral agents

primary_outcome.measure: Distribution of Healthcare costs for patients treated with oral drugs used in the first-line treatment of Metastatic renal cell carcinoma (mRCC)
primary_outcome.description: All-cause healthcare costs will be calculated in the first-line oral cohort as per-patient-per-month (PPPM) costs.

primary_outcome.measure: Composite of Resource Utilization for patients treated with oral drugs used in the first-line treatment of mRCC
primary_outcome.description: Total numbers and rates of inpatient, outpatient, and emergency room visits per patient will be calculated.

primary_outcome.measure: Distribution of Healthcare costs for patients treated with IV drugs used in the first-line treatment of mRCC
primary_outcome.description: All-cause healthcare costs will be calculated in the first-line IV cohort as per-patient-per-month (PPPM) costs.

primary_outcome.measure: Composite of Resource Utilization for patients treated with IV drugs used in the first-line treatment of mRCC
primary_outcome.description: Total numbers and rates of inpatient, outpatient, and emergency room visits per patient will be calculated.

secondary_outcome.measure: Medication Possession Ratio (MPR) for patients treated with oral drugs used in the first-line treatment of mRCC
secondary_outcome.description: MPR will be calculated for each index drug as the ratio of the sum of the total number of days' supply to the total number of days in the follow-up period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Medication Possession Ratio (MPR) for patients treated with IV drugs used in the first-line treatment of mRCC
secondary_outcome.description: MPR will be calculated for each index drug as the ratio of the sum of the total number of days' supply to the total number of days in the follow-up period.

arm_group.description: Metastatic renal cell carcinoma patients treated with IV agents
Metastatic renal cell carcinoma patients treated with oral agents

study_pop.textblock: Metastatic RCC patients in the US identified from administrative claim databases

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis with metastatic renal cell carcinoma
- Prescription/administration of one of the IV or oral agents examined in the study
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with other primary cancer diagnosis before RCC diagnosis
- Patients with pregnancy or HIV/AIDS
